HT_Text_Sakk_5_Cer_1_Seth_Crown_Gebqueen.message: Lord Set, the Gebs are eternally grateful to you for bringing the <FC 0,128,0>Sacred Crown of Uruk<END FC>. The Crown will be totally secure in our hands.<E>
I am sure that you speak the truth. If not, the consequences for you will be terrible indeed.<E>
Do not worry, my Lord Set. Nobody has ever been able to overcome the power of the Geb Queen...<E>

HT_Text_Sakk_5_Boss_Fight_Gebqueen1a.message: How dare you enter into the palace of the Geb Queen?!<E>

HT_Text_Sakk_5_Boss_Fight_Gebqueen1b.message: You will pay the ultimate price for your insolence. Prepare to die!<E>

HT_Text_Sakk_5_Boss_Death_Gebqueen1a.message:
You may have defeated me, but Set will annihilate you.

Your efforts were all for nothing... it's too late... you will never defeat him...

HT_Text_Sakk_5_TakeCrown1a.message: Another crown whose power you do not understand.<E>

HT_Text_Sakk_5_TakeCrown1b.message: The path that you choose is one of grave danger...<E>

HT_Text_Sakk_5_TakeCrown1c.message: Only the most determined of heroes will succeed.<E>

HT_Text_Sakk_5_TakeCrown1d.message: The Prophecy is beginning to be realized at last... But will you be the one to bring about its conclusion?<E>

HT_Text_Sakk_5_TakeCrown1e.message:
Take this Gold Ankh as a reward for your achievement.

This magic artifact has increased your health capacityby 1 Ankh and has fully replenished your health!
